folder: Lyman Avenue & Tompkins Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Lyman Avenue, at Tompkins Avenue, showing the Staten Island
Railroad crossing. The view is eastward.
August 23, 1935
P. L. Sperr

folder: Tompkins Avenue & Lyman Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Tompkins Ave., at Lyman Ave. (foreground, not seen). The view is northward along the South Beach hranch of the Staten Island Railroad, showing its Fort Wadsworth station (Fingerboard Road station), at Fingerboard Road. The latter road spans the tracks directly beyond the station. On the left are seen the rears of buildings facing on the
south side of Fingerboard Road.
August23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
